resources.string: Press on color below to apply
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Seek music tracks by long-pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Wake device by pressing the button
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Activate the torch by long-pressing the power button while the display is off
Display media cover art when available
Animate smooth lava lamp style color blend
Force apps to ignore notch space
Double-tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put device asleep
Display status bar on the lockscreen
Allow accessing power menu on secure lockscreen
Allow accessing quick settings on secure lockscreen
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display clock in quick status bar header
Blur empty space in notification panel below quick settings
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Play sound when screenshot is taken
Customize no. of steps in volume panel
Customize the animations of each window in system
This is test for toast animation
Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Display icon of activity that generates toast message
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display the number of pending notifications
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down quick settings
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide and display clock for regular interval to save statusbar space
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Always display battery percentage when charging
Control which status bar icons are shown
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Merge signal and signal type icons
Display the cross sign next to signal icon when data is disabled
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Double-tap on the status bar to put device asleep
Enabling this will disable hardware keys for navigation
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Display and customize current network traffic levels
Hide the traffic monitor when inactive
Whether to show traffic measurement units
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Duration after which speed is remeasured
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Display input method selector in notification
Allow keyboard to take up entire screen in landscape
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
When Gaming mode is turned on, buttons will be locked
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
Display popup notifications only for alarm, dialer and messaging app
Configure led color based on battery level and status
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Sets the ambient light animation duration
Show Ambient Display when a new music track is played
Pulse notifications on removal from pocket
Duration to vibrate when pulsing notifications
Hide all force close notification dialogs
Allow override of default values with user config
Notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Notifications will be inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Settings based on sensors are subject to hardware compatibility. Enabling sensors for ambient display may increase power drain.
Take fullscreen screenshot via volume keys
Drag selection on the area for screenshot via volume keys
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into recovery or bootloader
Display advanced restart options on secured lockscreen
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
Hide apps from appearing in recents screen
These apps will be automatically hide from recents screen when they are opened next time
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown
Reset battery statistics after reaching user defined charging level

Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery. When enabled, battery stops charging at Stop trigger level and resumes charging at Start trigger level. Stop trigger level should be always greater than Start trigger level.
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Use wallpaper color for FOD icon
Uses adjusted primary wallpaper color for FOD icon\nNOTE: might look good only with some wallpapers
Shows animation while reading your finger
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Display image at top of the notification panel
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Select an image to use for static mode
Amount of screen height used as touchable region for back gesture.
Enable haptic tick effect on back gesture
Hide the navigation bar pill for seamless fullscreen gestures.
Show an animated arrow for back gesture.
Disable the new access restrictions for device identifiers
Display notification when changing alert slider position
vibration pattern, vibration intensity, incall, haptics, tap, vibration strength
Show data usage in qs header
Shows data usage in quick settings header of SIM used for data
Auto / Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to 90Hz for some content
60Hz / Refresh rate locked at 60Hz for all content
90Hz / Refresh rate locked at 90Hz for all content. Increased battery usage
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
